clinical_study.brief_title: Early Lung Rehabilitation Care for Patients After Double Lung Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock: Develop appropriate individual programs for patients to implement lung rehabilitation safely and effectively.

detailed_description.textblock: Early respiratory function training, reasonable oxygen therapy to prevent hypoxemia, Positive pressure vibration training to promote coughing ability recovery, early exercise, Health education and psychological support.
